restaurants.name: The Garlic
restaurants.address: 556 E 3rd Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Fresh seafood with a garlic twist. Known for their signature garlic butter crab legs and waterfront dining experience.

restaurants.name: JB's Fish Camp
restaurants.address: 859 Pompano Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Casual waterfront spot serving fresh-off-the-boat seafood with stunning views of the Indian River.

restaurants.name: Third Wave Cafe
restaurants.address: 204 Flagler Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Hip cafe on Flagler Avenue offering creative American dishes with locally-sourced ingredients and craft cocktails.

restaurants.name: Taco Shack
restaurants.address: 105 Flagler Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Beach-style tacos and burritos with fresh ingredients. Perfect for a quick bite after hitting the waves.

restaurants.name: Norwood's Eatery & Treehouse Bar
restaurants.address: 400 E 2nd Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Upscale seafood dining featuring a unique treehouse bar. A local institution since 1979.

restaurants.name: SoNapa Grille
restaurants.address: 334 Flagler Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: California-meets-Italy cuisine with an extensive wine list and elegant atmosphere on Flagler Avenue.

restaurants.name: Breakers Ocean Front
restaurants.address: 4491 S Atlantic Ave, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Oceanfront restaurant with panoramic beach views. Serving classic American fare from breakfast to dinner.

restaurants.name: Yellow Dog Eats
restaurants.address: 147 Canal St, New Smyrna Beach, FL
restaurants.description: Quirky BBQ joint serving award-winning pulled pork, craft beers, and live music in a fun, eclectic setting.
